name: 奥尔加·罗
introduction: Olga Roh is fashion designer, actress, model, journalist, TV presenter, lawyer and entrepreneur.At 26, as one of the youngest Swiss students at the University of Bern, Switzerland she achieved her PhD (Dr Phil) in addition to achieving several Academic Diplomas of the philosophical faculty in Literature, Pedagogy & Psychology, Languages and Arts.Having attended the Marangoni Institute in London she immersed herself in fashion design and business, gaining a Masters in fashion and founded her own fashion house Rohmir and as Founder and Creative Director, Olga still owns the Rohmir Group of Companies.In 2011 she became the official designer for the Miss Switzerland beauty contest, this title remains for life.With the motto "don't harm your body, do wear the right clothes" she created a significant international following of clients and fashionistas.As an international model, Olga is well known on the catwalk and worked for many of the world's leading brands and has appeared in numerous publicity campaigns.In 2004, as an actress, she made her screen debut, in the French action thriller « Secret Agents » produced by Frédérique Schoendoerffer, alongside stars including Monica Bellucci, Vincent Cassel, and André Dussolier (TFM Distribution).Olga followed a classical musical education in piano and singing at a specialized music college in Moscow. Under her fashion brand Rohmir, she released the album "Born To Fly", produced by Uwe Fahrenkrog-Petersen (known for his international hit "99 air balloons", performed by Nena). Rohmir's songs are distributed on several platforms and are used in films, clubs and festivals.This year, 2023, she plays a significant film role in the thriller "Escape - the Fight of their Lives" by British award-winning film director Howard J. Ford (Paramount Pictures) due to be premiered worldwide, later this year having had its preview at the Soho Hotel Cinema on September 4th 2023. As a singer songwriter her latest single "Turbulence" makes its debut in this film.During Covid Olga studied and obtained her Master in law Degree.Olga Roh has appeared in Talk Shows in Germany, Switzerland and UK Television and in June 2023 she agreed to present a series of shows for a British-Italian TV Channel.As a member of the British Association of Journalists, Olga regularly contributes to British and international magazines as a freelance editor and writer.Olga Roh is a Swiss national of Russian descent and fluent in German, Russian, English, French and Swiss German, Italian and Cantonese.
